page.title: 09MONYASH SHOP
page.content: Mr. and Mrs.S.Foster have lived at Monyash shop for about 4 months.The shop itself is 104 years old and was built in 1881. The shop is a{general store and off- {licence.}The opening hours are 8.30am- 7.30pm except on Thursdays (8.30am-1.00pm.). The shop sells {groceries, confectionery, spirits, {tobacco and stationery.}There are 11 deliveries a week _ of bread and groceries. Alot of tourists come to the shop in Summer but most of the customers are local.The shop provides an essential service for those people without their own transport.Three people work in the shop _ the owner,her husband and a part-time assistant.In the shop-window people can put notices and adverts free of charge.
